Name: Roaring Flame Stove
Desc: <color=#9d9e9f>A brand-new stove with enhanced firepower!</color>\n\nIn the first stage, the ball release interval is shortened to 0.5s.

Name: Bunny Yummy Station
Desc: <color=#9d9e9f>Bunny, please use your magic to make this dish delicious!</color>\n\nBase points per round x1.2

Name: Star Bonus Wand
Desc: <color=#9d9e9f>Zap! Feel the boosting power of the stars!</color>\n\nIncreases the combo multiplier during the game.

Name: Zesty Universal Sauce
Desc: <color=#9d9e9f>Just three ingredients with this sauce, and you're on your way to the tastiest dumplings!</color>\n\nEach round simplifies ball rules, featuring only three types of ingredient balls.

Name: Lil' Lu's Summoning Magic
Desc: <color=#9d9e9f>Summon Lil' Lu to infuse this bowl with her special touch!</color>\n\n20% chance each round for score to double, increasing finished quantity by +1, combo +1.
